name: Geometry Clash (Zixuan, el2679, johnsonli)
description:
A low-poly style vertical shmup. More specifically, this is a bullet hell, a subgenre of shooter games that involve many projectiles on the screen at once. The player starts with no abilities play their way through multiple levels. They can collect coins by defeating enemies and get stronger by purchasing upgrades and abilities from the shop.  Levels get progressively more difficult and there's a boss at the end!

https://github.com/ecrystale/MobileGame
